TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Huang_Pens_Le-aw, title = Huang_Pens_Le-aw, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Huang_Pens_Le-aw} }

S.FORM: ci Huang Pens Le-aw (kamu nu Hulam: 璜‧朋斯‧雷奧, Juan Ponce de León) i cacay a malebut lima a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku tulu (1513) a mihcaan nu aydaay a Florida (Fou-luo-li-ta-cuo 佛羅里達州) makatukuh, cacay a milbut lima a lasubu tulu a bataan siwa (1539) a mihcaan, ci Henadu.sutuo (赫南多‧索托, Hernando de Soto) sayaway makatukuh i Florida (Fuo-luo-li-ta 佛羅里達), micumud aca tayda i Misisi-pi a sauwac mitahaw, cacay a malebut lima a lasubu sepat a bataan (1540) a mihcaan, ci Falansise.Keluonatu (法蘭西斯科‧科羅納度 Francisco Vázquezde Coronado) namaka cacay a malebtu lima a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku tusa (1522) a mihcaa mahiya madebung nu Si-pan-ya ku Mexico (Muo-si-ke 墨西哥) pasaydan i amis muculil. mangalay mikilim tu nakamuwan nu babalaki a Sipuo-laci tukay (西伯拉七城市 , amica kunikacaay ka tepa', naculilan mamin ku Yalisan-na a cascasan atu "Tay-pinyun a enal" .

ci Hoang Pens Le-aw (kamo no Holam: 璜‧朋斯‧雷奧, Joan Ponce de León) i cacay a malebot lima a lasobo cacay a bataan idaw ko tolo (1513) a mihcaan no aydaay a Florida (Foo-loo-li-ta-coo 佛羅里達州) makatokoh, cacay a milbot lima a lasobo tolo a bataan siwa (1539) a mihcaan, ci Henado.sotoo (赫南多‧索托, Hernando de Soto) sayaway makatokoh i Florida (Foo-loo-li-ta 佛羅里達), micomod aca tayda i Misisi-pi a saowac mitahaw, cacay a malebot lima a lasobo sepat a bataan (1540) a mihcaan, ci Falansise.Keloonato (法蘭西斯科‧科羅納度 Francisco Vázqoezde Coronado) namaka cacay a malebto lima a lasobo tosa a bataan idaw ko tosa (1522) a mihcaa mahiya madebong no Si-pan-ya ko Mexico (Moo-si-ke 墨西哥) pasaydan i amis mocolil. mangalay mikilim to nakamowan no babalaki a Sipoo-laci tokay (西伯拉七城市 , amica konikacaay ka tepa', nacolilan mamin ko Yalisan-na a cascasan ato "Tay-pinyon a enal" .
